item.title: Deploy a Lambda@Edge function to authenticate with Cognito
item.description: In this step, you will find and deploy one serverless application that have been published to the AWS Serverless Application Repository. The application enables authentication with Amazon Cognito for your website. The following diagram is a high-level architecture of this lab There are two S3 bucket Private S3 bucket: contains private content, users can not access the content before login by Cognito Public S3 bucket: contains the demo website resources, users can access it through CloudFront publicly Here is how it works
